name: Road Dogs
description: Trade and loot in real time world of post-apocalyptic Arizona. Join gangs and create unique vehicles! Engage in massive battles and choose from hundreds of customizable vehicles and guns, trade in drugs, pr♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥s, and slaves. Make your fantasy work, just like in an old school game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista or later Processor: Dual-Core 1.5 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 7 or later Processor: Dual-Core 1.7 GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
